binding:binding.name: WMBus Binding
binding:binding.description: The WMBus binding uses a WMBus radio USB stick to receive messages and decode the contents to show the data of the devices in the UI. It uses the jMBus library, but currently, only the Techem heat cost allocators are supported.
binding:binding.author: Hanno - Felix Wagner, Ernst Rohlicek, Roman Malyugin
